DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess how patients with gastro-oesophageal reflux disease (heartburn) who are currently receiving treatment with a proton pump inhibitor but are still experiencing symptoms will benefit from a change in treatment.
DOC.criteria: Persisting symptoms of GORD despite previous treatment with a full dose proton pump inhibitor Informed consent Over 18 years of age Current course of Proton Pump inhibitor treatment for more than 8 weeks prior to enrolment in the study; More than 1 other course of PPI treatment in the previous 12 month; Previous use of esomeprazole; Presence of alarm symptoms.
